result.msg:
<select id="tokenize" multiple="multiple" class="tokenize-sample">
        <option ng-repeat="name in selectList" value="{{name}}">{{name}}</option>
    </select>
    
    <button style="margin:10px 0 10px 0;" class="btn btn-sm btn-success" onclick='sendSelected()'>Update</button>
    
    <style>
    #tokenize, .Tokenize, .Tokenize .TokensContainer {
        width: 100%;
    }
    </style>
    
    <script>
    
    //
    // LOADING THE COMPONENT
    //
    
    // Include the component css
    var fileref=document.createElement("link");
    fileref.setAttribute("rel", "stylesheet");
    fileref.setAttribute("type", "text/css");
    fileref.setAttribute("href", '//cdn.rawgit.com/zellerda/Tokenize/master/jquery.tokenize.css');
    if (typeof fileref!="undefined")
        document.getElementsByTagName("head")[0].appendChild(fileref);
    
    // Remove some CSS from Zeppelin so that the component renders well
    var id = document.getElementById("tokenize").parentElement.getAttribute('id');
    document.getElementById(id).style.overflow = "visible";
    
    // Load the js and render the component after
    jQuery.when(
        // Load the js
        jQuery.getScript('//cdn.rawgit.com/zellerda/Tokenize/master/jquery.tokenize.js'),
        jQuery("#tokenize").ready,
        jQuery.Deferred(function( deferred ){
            jQuery( deferred.resolve );
        })
    ).done(function(){
        jQuery('#tokenize').tokenize();
    });
    
    
    
    // Send selected items to Backend
    function sendSelected() {
        var selected = jQuery('#tokenize').tokenize().toArray();
        console.log('Hello selection %o', selected);
        //for (var i = 0; i < selected.length; i++) {
        //    results[i] = selected[i].value;
        //}
        angular.element('html').scope().compiledScope.selections = selected;
    }
    
    </script>

paragraphs.text:
%spark

/*
 Data Ingestion Paragraph
 Auto-complete list will be automatically updated when selectList change on back-end
*/
z.angularUnbind("selectList")
z.angularUnbind("selections")
z.angularBind("selectList", Array("Apache","Zeppelin","Moon", "Damien", "Anthony", "Sejun"))
z.angularBind("selections", Array())
